analysis.description:
Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol#498-521) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(foundersTokensWallet,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol#512-514)
	-token.mint(bountyTokensWallet,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol#514-517)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol#517-518)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol#522-526) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol)

Crowdsale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(multisigWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/19/0x83be287610d69c91eb18120a824e1a54b95f5a67.sol#87-92) is not in mixedCase
